6.87.text:
I want you to have a
good a time as possible

8.29.text: but I also want you to be able to take

9.27.text: some of that goodness away with you.

11.39.text: So I'm going to be letting you know

12.79.text:
what we have set up here
but also how you can

14.75.text: kind of take it with you

17.26.text:
Especially if it's somewhere
that's unsupportive.

19.95.text:
I know that when we're
a little bit stressed

21.73.text: we sometimes forget to take care

22.96.text:
of ourselves properly,
even our most basic needs.

25.22.text: So I've got a lot of water set out

27.45.text:
and different drinks so
you can stay hydrated.

29.48.text:
We've cooked some of
everyone's favourite foods

33.26.text:
If you need some rest we
have the guest bedroom

35.49.text:
set up so you can go
there whenever you want.

37.92.text: Or if you want to take a walk feel free.

39.86.text: Or if you need to keep busy and be helpful

42.09.text: then I'm sure there's some stuff we could

45.26.text: Taking care of yourself is something

46.18.text: you should be doing wherever you are.

47.46.text:
So if it's something
you're likely to forget

49.27.text: maybe set reminders on your phone

51.20.text: or take a moment to listen to your body

54.75.text: and work out what you need.

56.51.text: Now I know that you texted me

57.38.text:
a couple of your
limitations before we came

59.36.text: so just to let you know there are

61.49.text: a couple of people who won't be going

62.57.text:
to church service 'cause
it's not their thing

64.30.text: and there's a couple of things that

65.99.text: we're probably gonna try not to discuss

67.72.text:
'cause it's gonna make
some people uncomfortable.

69.25.text: If it's possible and you feel comfortable

70.78.text: maybe consider talking to your family

74.05.text: about limitations that you might have

75.95.text:
in terms of things that
you don't want to do

77.74.text:
or that you're
uncomfortable talking about.

79.63.text:
Now hopefully there's not
going to be any worries

80.94.text:
about your physical
safety while you're here

82.73.text: but mental safety is just as important.

84.93.text: So know that you can give yourself time

87.22.text: and that you can give yourself space

89.46.text: If you need to step out for a minute

91.82.text: If you need to leave early or arrive late

97.72.text:
When you're not here
maybe you've gone to visit

99.41.text: family or are in a situation that might be

103.89.text:
But it's totally fine
for you to leave early

106.28.text: or arrive late or step out in the middle

109.08.text: if you need a while to yourself.

110.93.text:
If you feel like you're
going into a situation

112.62.text:
that might be difficult,
uncomfortable, volatile,

115.51.text: then maybe consider having a plan

118.85.text: Have someone that you can call

120.42.text:
if you need to leave
who is going to be able

122.07.text: to pick you up and make sure

123.96.text:
Now I know that there
are a lot of people here

125.39.text: and most people you haven't met.

127.45.text:
So what I've done is
I've got some name badges

129.19.text: so if you'll put your name and put

132.01.text:
we'll make sure that
everyone respects them.

133.76.text:
But I know you might be
going into some spaces

135.43.text:
which aren't as accepting
of your identity,

142.30.text: Maybe physically in a notebook or maybe

144.40.text: set more reminders on your phone.

146.61.text: Just remind yourself that you're valid

151.53.text:
we actually sort of have
a little queer library

153.10.text: being set up at the moment.

154.27.text:
A lot of people brought
secondhand books, DVD's,

156.54.text: music that was by or about LGBT people.

159.97.text:
So feel free to have a
rummage around in there.

162.71.text: If you're feeling low and lonely within

167.41.text: then I think it's always good to find

173.46.text:
There are movies, TV
shows, podcasts, books,

177.97.text: music which show being LGBT in a positive

185.43.text: If you know that you can listen or watch

187.71.text:
or read while you're
at this uncomfortable,

191.95.text:
If not, consider doing
it before and afterwards

195.98.text: So I know that a couple of your friends

197.06.text: are here already and don't worry,

198.75.text:
we've kind of arranged
the seating at the table

200.53.text:
so that everyone is close
to at least some people

204.15.text:
Just so everyone's
feeling nice and relaxed.

206.22.text: But maybe sometime soon you're going to be

207.78.text: in a space where you don't have anyone

209.86.text: physically there who is going to be able

212.35.text: In that case consider scheduling calls

219.11.text:
Remind yourself that
there are people out there

221.48.text:
You might be able to
spend time with supportive

223.56.text: online communities that you're a part of.

224.89.text:
Or even look into
helplines or support groups

228.61.text:
if that's something
that's going to help you.

230.77.text: My last piece of advice I suppose

232.60.text: is a little bit harder potentially

235.93.text: than setting a reminder on your phone

238.53.text: For a lot of LGBT people a big part

240.97.text: of the difficulty around the holidays

246.18.text: And I think the found family especially

257.09.text:
If you do have a little
queer family of your own

263.00.text: It doesn't have to be people that

264.44.text:
you're related to that
you call your family

266.23.text: and that you spend your holidays with.

270.32.text:
those are all wonderful
people who love you,

275.31.text: who you love and support in return

277.00.text: that you can spend an amazing holiday with

282.34.text:
Sorry, that was very
serious and long-winded

286.18.text:
we actually just got
pastries out of the oven

288.48.text: so they should be cool enough to eat now.

292.10.text: and you can say hi to everyone.

293.72.text: And at some point if you would like to

295.60.text: sign the guest book I've set one up

298.59.text: So let me know what you'd love to see at

301.20.text: a queer friendly Christmas and I'll see

303.31.text: if I can make it happen next year.

305.59.text: I hope you find this useful whenever

307.75.text:
Because I'm me I've left
some links to resources

310.01.text:
in the description that
you might find useful.

312.24.text: You are a wonderful lovable penguin

315.69.text: and I hope you have a fantastic day.

318.88.text: Until I see you next time, bye.
